$interpreted: Master Orchid: Let's begin today's lesson. When we wish somebody to feel beauty, there are three points that we must appeal to—form, flavor, and idea.
Chiyuki: Form, flavor, idea... I know the first two must be referring to appearance and scent, but what about the last one?
Master Orchid: The idea is the broadest branch of beauty. It can encompass confidence, but also willpower and resolve.
Master Orchid: With a little polishing, these concepts can be sublimated into an entire mindscape.
Chiyuki: (An entire mindscape... Like the flowers that Master brought flowering forth.)
Master Orchid: Come with me.
Master Orchid: Stand here.
Chiyuki: Stand!? But it's all pointy.
Master Orchid: Don't question it. Questioning leads to hesitation, and hesitation will make you flinch.
Chiyuki: It hurts!
Master Orchid: This is the Mangosteen Road. It's excellent for your health. Now walk back and forth.
Chiyuki: Walk!? But... it's...
Master Orchid: There are no shortcuts when it comes to our ideas. We can only endure, and endure again.
Chiyuki: But... How long do I have to walk for?
Master Orchid: Let's do ten laps to start with.
Chiyuki: Ten!? That'll be enough to kill me!
Master Orchid: Is that so? Well then, come find me if you survive.
Chiyuki: Master! Master!
Chiyuki: (Hanazono Chiyuki, you're doing this all for beauty...)
Chiyuki: Hana...zono...Chi...yuki! You... can do it! Don't... give up!
Chiyuki: Ma...ster... I've done... ten laps...
Master Orchid: Very good. Now go take a dip in the hot springs. Let your body recover and relax.
Chiyuki: The hot springs! Are you for real?
Master Orchid: The onsen's right there. Don't believe me? Go take a look, the water here is superb for your skin.
Chiyuki: Thank you, Master!
Chiyuki: Aahhh~~~~
Master Orchid: How's the water?
Chiyuki: It's scalding hot!
Master Orchid: I see. Try that pool over there instead, then.
Master Orchid: It's not meant to be uncomfortable.
Chiyuki: Eeeek!!!
Master Orchid: What now?
Chiyuki: It's so c-c-cold, I can feel the chill in m-m-my bones.
Master Orchid: That's right, this is the Iceflame Pool. You'll bathe here every day.
Chiyuki: Are you messing with me?
Master Orchid: Do I look like I'm joking~?
Chiyuki: B-b-b-but...
Master Orchid: No buts.
Chiyuki: Eeeeek~~!!
Master Orchid: Remember to soak up to your shoulders, too.
Chiyuki: Y-y-yes...
: With such arduous training, ten days breeze past...
Master Orchid: ...That's it for today's lesson.
Chiyuki: Finally... class dismissed...
Master Orchid: Ohh~ I see you're still conscious and communicative this time. You've improved.
Chiyuki: Really...?
Master Orchid: You've been here ten days now, would you believe it.
Chiyuki: Master, may I ask your advice?
Master Orchid: Ask away.
Chiyuki: What exactly is the limit of beauty that you all talk about? I've flipped through every book here and can't find any answers.
Master Orchid: Ah, the limit of beauty... I've been searching for many years. Actually, I've still not reached a concrete answer myself. I'm not sure either.
Chiyuki: Then how do you know if you're going in the right direction?
Master Orchid: You'll always find something, as long as you keep looking.
Master Orchid: This idea was left to us by our predecessors. It's another of our guiding principles.
Chiyuki: As long as I keep looking...
Disciple: Master! Mayday's back!
Master Orchid: Oh no...
Chiyuki: Who's that?
Master Orchid: An old colleague of mine.
Mayday: After so many years, this place is still looking as ugly as ever.
Angry Disciple: You dare to set foot here again, even after your expulsion!
Mayday: Let's get one thing straight. I couldn't stand all of your stupidity and left of my own will.
Master Orchid: Mayday.
Mayday: Long time no see, Orchid.
Chiyuki: (That's Mayday?)
Master Orchid: I'm afraid you're not welcome here.
Mayday: Oh my, how loud and pushy you've become, now that you're the Master. Just think, we were once disciples together.
Master Orchid: It was you who deviated from our school's aims. You made your choice.
Mayday: Hmph. We'll soon see which of us was right.
Mayday: Look at you suckers. Only an idiot would believe in the Ascetics' path. And look who did finally reach the limit of beauty in the end.
Angry Disciple: You don't mean you reached it yourself!?
Mayday: Heheh... Bingo. I've come today to teach you what the limit of beauty really means.
Master Orchid: Perfume? That's your answer?
Chiyuki: No, Master, this doesn't look like any ordinary perfume. That color... I've never seen anything like it at the market.
Mayday: You're very observant, Miss. This is my own special formula. As for its effects, just see for yourself!

Mayday: Oh, black due, heaviest of all magic arts,
Reach down into dirt and melt these mortal hearts!
Chiyuki: This smell... Everybody, don't breathe in the perfume!
Mayday: [Black Rain]!
Scornful Disciple: What's happening? Such an intense aroma, it feels like it's burning up inside me...
Dopey Disciple: Master Mayday.
Dazed Disciple: Master Mayday.
Mayday: Hyahyahyah~ What do you think? This is the limit of beauty, Mayday style.
Chiyuki: Shame on you!
Chiyuki: You've mixed in purple poppy seeds! They'll all become addicted!
Mayday: Oh, you're a clever one. No wonder you didn't fall for it.
Master Orchid: So it's purple poppy, is it.
Chiyuki: Master! Thank heavens you're all right!
Master Orchid: It's all a rotten, dirty trick.
Mayday: Nice going, Orchid.
Master Orchid: Mayday, what have you gotten yourself mixed up in these dark arts for?
Mayday: Who are you to judge what's right and wrong?
Master Orchid: Watch closely.
Master Orchid: [Springtime Bloom]!
Recovered Disciple: Ahh, I remember this feeling, so pure and clean~
Chiyuki: Hooray! Everybody's snapped out of it.
Mayday: Still growing the same gardens, are you? You haven't improved yourself one bit.
Master Orchid: What did you say?
Mayday: Now I'll reveal the real power of perfume.
Chiyuki: He's got a second bottle!?
Mayday: Moonlit zephyrs, let your dance with darkness begin—

Mayday: Wallow in the faded dusk, etched upon the gloom—
Harmony of silver and black, with new wings reborn—
Mayday: [Blackwing Butterflies]!
Dopey Disciple: Ah~ I see a ray of hope glinting in the endless darkness, dazzling bright.
Chiyuki: (This perfume's so strong... Dammit, what'll it do to them...)

Master Orchid: Two can play at that! Breeze of broken jades, console these lost souls—
 Let hope take wing and escape the dark, let the light restore the wholes—
Master Orchid: [Blossom Bolero]!
Dopey Disciple: Haha, the butterflies are dancing with the flowers...
Master Orchid: Do you understand now, Mayday? It's useless, no matter what tricks you pull!
Mayday: So what!
Master Orchid: So there!
Mayday: Crimson red, bare your seductive fangs—
Mayday: Turn envoy of enthrallment and bless your bloodlust—
Mayday: [Bloodred Butterflies]!
Master Orchid: No! Urgh... his evil ways are so strong...
Bewitched Disciple: Master Mayday...
Submissive Disciple: Awaiting your orders, Master Mayday...
Mayday: You see! You'll all bow before me!
Chiyuki: (Master Orchid's been defeated... But how... ngh... My mind...)
Mayday: Stop fighting it and join us, Orchid.
Master Orchid: Never...
Mayday: Suit yourself. Get him!
Mayday: At such close range, even you can't resist now.
Chiyuki: (No... I have to stop him... What should I do...)
Chiyuki: (I know...!)
Mayday: What's this? Snowflakes!?
Dopey Disciple: Feels so fresh and elegant...
Recovered Disciple: Eh? What am I doing?
Mayday: What!?
Mayday: You! This is all your doing?
Mayday: Don't believe for a second that I'll lose to a novice like you!
Mayday: You lot! Get her!
Chiyuki: ......
Mayday: Uhh, well, how interesting. Let's just stop here for today.
Master Orchid: You're just going to... run away?
Mayday: Please. I'm saving my strength for a more worthy adversary.
Mayday: You, Miss. I hereby challenge you—to a duel!
Master Orchid: Wait, this doesn't concern her.
Mayday: Shut it, loser.
Mayday: So? Do you dare accept my invitation?
Chiyuki: ......
Mayday: I'll take your silence as a tacit acceptance. Very good. I'll return in three days' time.
Panicked Disciple: What'll we do? He challenged her to a duel.
Overconfident Disciple: What are you afraid of? Chiyuki can take him.
Master Orchid: Chiyuki!?

Model.Text: Let's begin today's lesson. When we wish somebody to feel beauty, there are three points that we must appeal to—form, flavor, and idea.
Form, flavor, idea... I know the first two must be referring to appearance and scent, but what about the last one?
The idea is the broadest branch of beauty. It can encompass confidence, but also willpower and resolve.
With a little polishing, these concepts can be sublimated into an entire mindscape.
(An entire mindscape... Like the flowers that Master brought flowering forth.)
Come with me.
Stand here.
Stand!? But it's all pointy.
Don't question it. Questioning leads to hesitation, and hesitation will make you flinch.
It hurts!
This is the Mangosteen Road. It's excellent for your health. Now walk back and forth.
Walk!? But... it's...
There are no shortcuts when it comes to our ideas. We can only endure, and endure again.
But... How long do I have to walk for?
Let's do ten laps to start with.
Ten!? That'll be enough to kill me!
Is that so? Well then, come find me if you survive.
Master! Master!
(Hanazono Chiyuki, you're doing this all for beauty...)
Hana...zono...Chi...yuki! You... can do it! Don't... give up!
Ma...ster... I've done... ten laps...
Very good. Now go take a dip in the hot springs. Let your body recover and relax.
The hot springs! Are you for real?
The onsen's right there. Don't believe me? Go take a look, the water here is superb for your skin.
Thank you, Master!
Aahhh~~~~
How's the water?
It's scalding hot!
I see. Try that pool over there instead, then.
It's not meant to be uncomfortable.
Eeeek!!!
What now?
It's so c-c-cold, I can feel the chill in m-m-my bones.
That's right, this is the Iceflame Pool. You'll bathe here every day.
Are you messing with me?
Do I look like I'm joking~?
B-b-b-but...
No buts.
Eeeeek~~!!
Remember to soak up to your shoulders, too.
Y-y-yes...
With such arduous training, ten days breeze past...
...That's it for today's lesson.
Finally... class dismissed...
Ohh~ I see you're still conscious and communicative this time. You've improved.
Really...?
You've been here ten days now, would you believe it.
Master, may I ask your advice?
Ask away.
What exactly is the limit of beauty that you all talk about? I've flipped through every book here and can't find any answers.
Ah, the limit of beauty... I've been searching for many years. Actually, I've still not reached a concrete answer myself. I'm not sure either.
Then how do you know if you're going in the right direction?
You'll always find something, as long as you keep looking.
This idea was left to us by our predecessors. It's another of our guiding principles.
As long as I keep looking...
Master! Mayday's back!
Oh no...
Who's that?
An old colleague of mine.
After so many years, this place is still looking as ugly as ever.
You dare to set foot here again, even after your expulsion!
Let's get one thing straight. I couldn't stand all of your stupidity and left of my own will.
Mayday.
Long time no see, Orchid.
(That's Mayday?)
I'm afraid you're not welcome here.
Oh my, how loud and pushy you've become, now that you're the Master. Just think, we were once disciples together.
It was you who deviated from our school's aims. You made your choice.
Hmph. We'll soon see which of us was right.
Look at you suckers. Only an idiot would believe in the Ascetics' path. And look who did finally reach the limit of beauty in the end.
You don't mean you reached it yourself!?
Heheh... Bingo. I've come today to teach you what the limit of beauty really means.
Perfume? That's your answer?
No, Master, this doesn't look like any ordinary perfume. That color... I've never seen anything like it at the market.
You're very observant, Miss. This is my own special formula. As for its effects, just see for yourself!

Oh, black due, heaviest of all magic arts,
Reach down into dirt and melt these mortal hearts!
This smell... Everybody, don't breathe in the perfume!
[Black Rain]!
What's happening? Such an intense aroma, it feels like it's burning up inside me...
Master Mayday.
Master Mayday.
Hyahyahyah~ What do you think? This is the limit of beauty, Mayday style.
Shame on you!
You've mixed in purple poppy seeds! They'll all become addicted!
Oh, you're a clever one. No wonder you didn't fall for it.
So it's purple poppy, is it.
Master! Thank heavens you're all right!
It's all a rotten, dirty trick.
Nice going, Orchid.
Mayday, what have you gotten yourself mixed up in these dark arts for?
Who are you to judge what's right and wrong?
Watch closely.
[Springtime Bloom]!
Ahh, I remember this feeling, so pure and clean~
Hooray! Everybody's snapped out of it.
Still growing the same gardens, are you? You haven't improved yourself one bit.
What did you say?
Now I'll reveal the real power of perfume.
He's got a second bottle!?
Moonlit zephyrs, let your dance with darkness begin—

Wallow in the faded dusk, etched upon the gloom—
Harmony of silver and black, with new wings reborn—
[Blackwing Butterflies]!
Ah~ I see a ray of hope glinting in the endless darkness, dazzling bright.
(This perfume's so strong... Dammit, what'll it do to them...)

Two can play at that! Breeze of broken jades, console these lost souls—
 Let hope take wing and escape the dark, let the light restore the wholes—
[Blossom Bolero]!
Haha, the butterflies are dancing with the flowers...
Do you understand now, Mayday? It's useless, no matter what tricks you pull!
So what!
So there!
Crimson red, bare your seductive fangs—
Turn envoy of enthrallment and bless your bloodlust—
[Bloodred Butterflies]!
No! Urgh... his evil ways are so strong...
Master Mayday...
Awaiting your orders, Master Mayday...
You see! You'll all bow before me!
(Master Orchid's been defeated... But how... ngh... My mind...)
Stop fighting it and join us, Orchid.
Never...
Suit yourself. Get him!
At such close range, even you can't resist now.
(No... I have to stop him... What should I do...)
(I know...!)
What's this? Snowflakes!?
Feels so fresh and elegant...
Eh? What am I doing?
What!?
You! This is all your doing?
Don't believe for a second that I'll lose to a novice like you!
You lot! Get her!
Uhh, well, how interesting. Let's just stop here for today.
You're just going to... run away?
Please. I'm saving my strength for a more worthy adversary.
You, Miss. I hereby challenge you—to a duel!
Wait, this doesn't concern her.
Shut it, loser.
So? Do you dare accept my invitation?
I'll take your silence as a tacit acceptance. Very good. I'll return in three days' time.
What'll we do? He challenged her to a duel.
What are you afraid of? Chiyuki can take him.
Chiyuki!?

too.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0188_003_dialog_english##_13_002","SpeakerName":"Chiyuki","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3537c3","IconName":"t3537c3_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Y-y-yes...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0188_003_dialog_english##_13_003","SpeakerName":"","SpeakerAssetName":"","IconName":"","IconLocate":1,"Text":"With such arduous training, ten days breeze past...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0188_003_dialog_english##_14_000","SpeakerName":"Master Orchid","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3639c4","IconName":"t3639c4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...That's it for today's lesson.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0188_003_dialog_english##_14_001","SpeakerName":"Chiyuki","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0188","IconName":"t0188s4_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Finally... class dismissed...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0188_003_dialog_english##_14_002","SpeakerName":"Master Orchid","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3639c4","IconName":"t3639c4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Ohh~ I see you're still conscious and communicative this time. You've improved.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0188_003_dialog_english##_14_003","SpeakerName":"Chiyuki","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0188","IconName":"t0188s4_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Really...?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0188_003_dialog_english##_14_004","SpeakerName":"Master Orchid","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3639c4","IconName":"t3639c4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"You've been here ten days now, would you believe it.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0188_003_dialog_english##_15_000","SpeakerName":"Chiyuki","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0188","IconName":"t0188s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Master, may I ask your advice?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0188_003_dialog_english##_15_001","SpeakerName":"Master Orchid","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3639c4","IconName":"t3639c4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Ask away.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0188_003_dialog_english##_15_002","SpeakerName":"Chiyuki","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0188","IconName":"t0188s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"What exactly is the limit of beauty that you all talk about? I've flipped through every book here and can't find any answers.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0188_003_dialog_english##_16_000","SpeakerName":"Master Orchid","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3639c4","IconName":"t3639c4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Ah, the limit of beauty... I've been searching for many years. Actually, I've still not reached a concrete answer myself. I'm not sure either.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0188_003_dialog_english##_16_001","SpeakerName":"Chiyuki","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0188","IconName":"t0188s4_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Then how do you know if you're going in the right direction?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0188_003_dialog_english##_16_002","SpeakerName":"Master Orchid","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3639c4","IconName":"t3639c4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"You'll always find something, as long as you keep looking.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0188_003_dialog_english##_17_000","SpeakerName":"Master Orchid","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3639c4","IconName":"t3639c4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"This idea was left to us by our predecessors. It's another of our guiding principles.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0188_003_dialog_english##_17_001","SpeakerName":"Chiyuki","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0188","IconName":"t0188s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"As long as I keep looking...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0188_003_dialog_english##_17_002","SpeakerName":"Disciple","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3449c4","IconName":"t3449c4_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Master! Mayday's back!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0188_003_dialog_english##_18_000","SpeakerName":"Master Orchid","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3639c4","IconName":"t3639c4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Oh no...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0188_003_dialog_english##_18_001","SpeakerName":"Chiyuki","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0188","IconName":"t0188s4_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Who's that?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0188_003_dialog_english##_18_002","SpeakerName":"Master Orchid","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3639c4","IconName":"t3639c4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"An old colleague of mine.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0188_003_dialog_english##_19_000","SpeakerName":"Mayday","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3640c4","IconName":"t3640c4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"After so many years, this place is still looking as ugly as ever.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0188_003_dialog_english##_19_001","SpeakerName":"Angry Disciple","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3450c4","IconName":"t3450c4_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"You dare to set foot here again, even after your expulsion!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0188_003_dialog_english##_19_002","SpeakerName":"Mayday","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3640c4","IconName":"t3640c4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Let's get one thing straight. I couldn't stand all of your stupidity and left of my own will.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0188_003_dialog_english##_20_000","SpeakerName":"Master Orchid","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3639c4","IconName":"t3639c4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Mayday.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0188_003_dialog_english##_20_001","SpeakerName":"Mayday","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3640c4","IconName":"t3640c4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Long time no see, Orchid.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0188_003_dialog_english##_20_002","SpeakerName":"Chiyuki","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0188","IconName":"t0188s4_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"(That's Mayday?)","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0188_003_dialog_english##_21_000","SpeakerName":"Master Orchid","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3639c4","IconName":"t3639c4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I'm afraid you're not welcome here.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0188_003_dialog_english##_21_001","SpeakerName":"Mayday","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3640c4","IconName":"t3640c4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Oh my, how loud and pushy you've become, now that you're the Master. Just think, we were once disciples together.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0188_003_dialog_english##_21_002","SpeakerName":"Master Orchid","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3639c4","IconName":"t3639c4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"It was you who deviated from our school's aims. You made your choice.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0188_003_dialog_english##_21_003","SpeakerName":"Mayday","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3640c4","IconName":"t3640c4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Hmph. We'll soon see which of us was right.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0188_003_dialog_english##_22_000","SpeakerName":"Mayday","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3640c4","IconName":"t3640c4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Look at you suckers. Only an idiot would believe in the Ascetics' path. And look who did finally reach the limit of beauty in the end.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0188_003_dialog_english##_22_001","SpeakerName":"Angry Disciple","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3450c4","IconName":"t3450c4_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"You don't mean you reached it yourself!?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0188_003_dialog_english##_22_002","SpeakerName":"Mayday","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3640c4","IconName":"t3640c4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Heheh... Bingo. I've come today to teach you what the limit of beauty really means.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0188_003_dialog_english##_23_000","SpeakerName":"Master Orchid","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3639c4","IconName":"t3639c4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Perfume? That's your answer?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0188_003_dialog_english##_23_001","SpeakerName":"Chiyuki","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0188","IconName":"t0188s4_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"No, Master, this doesn't look like any ordinary perfume. That color... I've never seen anything like it at the market.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0188_003_dialog_english##_23_002","SpeakerName":"Mayday","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3640c4","IconName":"t3640c4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"You're very observant, Miss. This is my own special formula. As for its effects, just see for yourself!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0188_003_dialog_english##_24_000","SpeakerName":"Mayday","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3640c4","IconName":"t3640c4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Oh, black due, heaviest of all magic arts,\nReach down into dirt and melt these mortal hearts!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0188_003_dialog_english##_25_000","SpeakerName":"Chiyuki","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0188","IconName":"t0188s4_sp3","IconLocate":2,"Text":"This smell... Everybody, don't breathe in the perfume!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0188_003_dialog_english##_25_001","SpeakerName":"Mayday","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3640c4","IconName":"t3640c4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"[Black Rain]!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0188_003_dialog_english##_26_000","SpeakerName":"Scornful Disciple","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3450c4","IconName":"t3450c4_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"What's happening? Such an intense aroma, it feels like it's burning up inside me...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0188_003_dialog_english##_27_000","SpeakerName":"Dopey Disciple","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3450c4","IconName":"t3450c4_sp1","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Master Mayday.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0188_003_dialog_english##_27_001","SpeakerName":"Dazed Disciple","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3449c4","IconName":"t3449c4_sp1","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Master Mayday.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0188_003_dialog_english##_27_002","SpeakerName":"Mayday","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3640c4","IconName":"t3640c4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Hyahyahyah~ What do you think? This is the limit of beauty, Mayday style.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0188_003_dialog_english##_27_003","SpeakerName":"Chiyuki","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0188","IconName":"t0188s4_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Shame on you!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0188_003_dialog_english##_28_000","SpeakerName":"Chiyuki","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0188","IconName":"t0188s4_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"You've mixed in purple poppy seeds! They'll all become addicted!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0188_003_dialog_english##_28_001","SpeakerName":"Mayday","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3640c4","IconName":"t3640c4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Oh, you're a clever one. No wonder you didn't fall for it.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0188_003_dialog_english##_28_002","SpeakerName":"Master Orchid","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3639c4","IconName":"t3639c4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"So it's purple poppy, is it.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0188_003_dialog_english##_29_000","SpeakerName":"Chiyuki","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0188","IconName":"t0188s4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Master! Thank heavens you're all right!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0188_003_dialog_english##_29_001","SpeakerName":"Master Orchid","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3639c4","IconName":"t3639c4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"It's all a rotten, dirty trick.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0188_003_dialog_english##_30_000","SpeakerName":"Mayday","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3640c4","IconName":"t3640c4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Nice going, Orchid.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0188_003_dialog_english##_30_001","SpeakerName":"Master Orchid","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3639c4","IconName":"t3639c4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Mayday, what have you gotten yourself mixed up in these dark arts for?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0188_003_dialog_english##_30_002","SpeakerName":"Mayday","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3640c4","IconName":"t3640c4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Who are you to judge what's right and wrong?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0188_003_dialog_english##_30_003","SpeakerName":"Master Orchid","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3639c4","IconName":"t3639c4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Watch closely.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0188_003_dialog_english##_31_000","SpeakerName":"Master Orchid","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3639c4","IconName":"t3639c4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"[Springtime Bloom]!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0188_003_dialog_english##_32_000","SpeakerName":"Recovered Disciple","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3450c4","IconName":"t3450c4_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Ahh, I remember this feeling, so pure and clean~","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0188_003_dialog_english##_32_001","SpeakerName":"Chiyuki","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0188","IconName":"t0188s4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Hooray! Everybody's snapped out of it.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0188_003_dialog_english##_32_002","SpeakerName":"Mayday","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3640c4","IconName":"t3640c4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Still growing the same gardens, are you? You haven't improved yourself one bit.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0188_003_dialog_english##_32_003","SpeakerName":"Master Orchid","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3639c4","IconName":"t3639c4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"What did you say?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0188_003_dialog_english##_32_004","SpeakerName":"Mayday","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3640c4","IconName":"t3640c4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Now I'll reveal the real power of perfume.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0188_003_dialog_english##_33_000","SpeakerName":"Chiyuki","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0188","IconName":"t0188s4_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"He's got a second bottle!?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0188_003_dialog_english##_33_001","SpeakerName":"Mayday","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3640c4","IconName":"t3640c4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Moonlit zephyrs, let your dance with darkness begin\u2014","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0188_003_dialog_english##_34_000","SpeakerName":"Mayday","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3640c4","IconName":"t3640c4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Wallow in the faded dusk, etched upon the gloom\u2014\nHarmony of silver and black, with new wings perfume's so strong... Dammit, what'll it do to them...)","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0188_003_dialog_english##_37_000","SpeakerName":"Master Orchid","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3639c4","IconName":"t3639c4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Two can play at that! It's useless, no matter what tricks you pull!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0188_003_dialog_english##_38_002","SpeakerName":"Mayday","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3640c4","IconName":"t3640c4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"So what!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0188_003_dialog_english##_39_000","SpeakerName":"Master Orchid","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3639c4","IconName":"t3639c4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"So there!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0188_003_dialog_english##_39_001","SpeakerName":"Mayday","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3640c4","IconName":"t3640c4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Crimson red, bare your seductive fangs\u2014","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0188_003_dialog_english##_40_000","SpeakerName":"Mayday","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3640c4","IconName":"t3640c4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Turn envoy of enthrallment and bless your bloodlust\u2014","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0188_003_dialog_english##_40_001","SpeakerName":"Mayday","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3640c4","IconName":"t3640c4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"[Bloodred Butterflies]!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0188_003_dialog_english##_41_000","SpeakerName":"Master Orchid","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3639c4","IconName":"t3639c4_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"No! But how... ngh... My mind...)","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0188_003_dialog_english##_44_000","SpeakerName":"Mayday","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3640c4","IconName":"t3640c4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Stop fighting it and join us, Orchid.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0188_003_dialog_english##_44_001","SpeakerName":"Master Orchid","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3639c4","IconName":"t3639c4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Never...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0188_003_dialog_english##_44_002","SpeakerName":"Mayday","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3640c4","IconName":"t3640c4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Suit yourself. Get him!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0188_003_dialog_english##_45_000","SpeakerName":"Mayday","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3640c4","IconName":"t3640c4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"At such close range, even you can't resist now.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0188_003_dialog_english##_46_000","SpeakerName":"Chiyuki","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0188","IconName":"t0188s4_sp3","IconLocate":2,"Text":"(No...
